name: Jeffrey BOARTS, Petitioner, v. Barry SILVER, M.D., Charles Kollmer, M.D., North Penn Hospital and Acromed, Inc., Respondents

parties: Jeffrey BOARTS, Petitioner, v. Barry SILVER, M.D., Charles Kollmer, M.D., North Penn Hospital and Acromed, Inc., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 29th day of October, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, is GRANTED. This matter is REMANDED to the trial court for further proceedings in accordance with this Court’s recent decision in Cheeseman v. Lethal Exterminator, Inc., - Pa. -, 701 A.2d 156 (1997).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Lawrence G. Metzger, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
Jeffrey BOARTS, Petitioner, v. Barry SILVER, M.D., Charles Kollmer, M.D., North Penn Hospital and Acromed, Inc., Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 29, 1997.
Lawrence G. Metzger, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
